title: [QUESTION] Animation buggy with SKGLView
body:
I animate a simple path in Xamarin.Forms SKCanvasView and SKGLView, but the rendered images are buggy with SKGLView:
**On SKCanvasView (expected animation):**
![gif1](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/48130657/53746776-39642800-3ea2-11e9-9dfa-4f3b607e5198.gif)
**On SKGLView (chaotic animation):**
![gif2](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/48130657/53746807-441ebd00-3ea2-11e9-8f39-c9d95f349263.gif)

The results are the same under UWP and Android (same code).
What am I doing wrong ? Thanks for your help.
